name: FAQ Plus – WordPress FAQ Plugin
author: NikanWP

sections.description:
WordPress FAQ Plugin helps you to easily display frequently asked questions on your WordPress website without coding.

Create Unlimited FAQ
Easily and without coding, create an unlimited number of common WordPress questions. When creating each question and answer, you can choose the type of question display mode in both your accordion and simple modes.

Generate Shortcode
After creating frequently asked WordPress questions, a short code is created that you can use this short code anywhere in the posts or pages, etc. You can also display its function anywhere in the WordPress theme.

Display FAQS
You can select the Frequently Asked Questions style from the plugin settings. That is, you can specify whether the display style is bootstrap or default.

Schema Support(FAQ Schema)
The use of schema has a great effect on the SEO of the site and makes it easier for search engines to communicate with your site. The WordPress FAQ plugin supports this feature by default.
